content.question: Which of the following best describes a disadvantage of geothermal energy production?

choices.label: Geothermal energy production is a significant source of noise pollution.
Geothermal energy implementation in homes and businesses has a high upfront cost, and electricity is needed to operate pumps.
Geothermal energy generation costs remain stable when gas and oil prices increase.
Geothermal energy is weather dependent and can be generated only at certain times of the year.

content.answer: Geothermal energy implementation in homes and businesses has a high upfront cost, and electricity is needed to operate pumps.
